articles.title: Kim Jong Un Inspects Headquarters of Large Combined Unit 380 of KPA
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Inspects Headquarters of Large Combined Unit 380 of KPA
 Pyongyang, November 25 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army (KPA) Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea and chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, inspected the Headquarters of Large Combined Unit 380 of the KPA.
					 He went round the monument to the field guidance of leader Kim Jong Il and a room for the education in the revolutionary history and a room devoted to the history of the unit.
					
					 Looking round the historic relics with keen interest, he said that the large combined unit grew to be a powerful elite unit fully prepared for both offensive and defence in modern warfare under the wise leadership and meticulous care of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He highly appreciated the feats performed by the service personnel of the unit, saying that the unit has performed praiseworthy feats in the defence of the country and socialist construction in the past period and made positive contributions to giving fullest play to the fighting spirit and militant traits of the KPA after being rapidly dispatched to the front for recovering from the flood damage in the northern part of the country, in particular.
					
					 Praising the unit for effectively conducting the education of its service personnel through the room for the education in the revolutionary history and the room devoted to the history of the unit after successfully arranging them, he underscored the need to intensify the education for helping them deeply grasp the undying feats of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and the glorious history and tradition of the unit.
					
					 Going round the soldiers' hall, he instructed the commanding officers of the unit to direct sustained big efforts to intensifying the five-point education set forth by the Party to successfully train the service personnel as indomitable fighters who do not abandon their revolutionary faith though they may die on the road of defending the socialist country.
					
					 After hearing a report on the defense operation plan of the unit from its commander at the military study room, he examined the documents on combat and went round various places including operation lecture room to learn in detail about the performance of duties by the units under the large combined unit and their trainings and regular combat preparedness.
					
					 He praised the commanding and staff officers of the large combined unit for rounding off operational and tactical plans, peculiar and superb, to carry out all operations and combats our own way.
					
					 He was satisfied to learn that they are firmly preparing the soldiers to be a-match-for-a-hundred fighters who are well versed in various combat methods and making full preparations for drills with high enthusiasm to bring about collective innovations in the next year's combat and political training, in particular.
					
					 Noting that the large combined unit has a very important duty to perform, he set forth important tasks which would serve as guidelines for increasing the unit's combat readiness and fighting capability in every way.
					
					 He said he felt confident of the area defended by the unit and expressed expectation and belief that the service personnel of the unit would firmly protect the socialist country with arms. Then he had a photo session with them.
					
					 Accompanying him were Hwang Pyong So, Choe Ryong Hae and Ri Yong Gil.

articles.title: Funeral for Ryu Mi Yong Held
articles.content:
Funeral for Ryu Mi Yong Held
 Pyongyang, November 25 (KCNA) -- A public funeral for Ryu Mi Yong, member of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly (SPA) of the DPRK, deputy to the SPA and chairwoman of the Central Committee of the Chondoist Chongu Party (CCP), took place here on Friday.
					 Present there were Yang Hyong Sop, Kim Yong Chol, Kim Yong Dae, chairman of the Central Committee of the Korean Social Democratic Party (KSDP), and other members of the funeral committee, officials of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, the SPA Presidium, the CCP Central Committee, the KSDP Central Committee, the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of the Country, the Secretariat of the Central Committee of the Democratic Front for the Reunification of Korea, the Central Committee of the Buddhist Federation of Korea, the Central Committee of  the Christian Federation of Korea and the Central Committee of the Catholic Association of Korea and bereaved family members of the deceased.
					
					 Bereaved family members and members of the funeral committee observed a moment's silence in memory of the deceased before her coffin was carried out of the Sojang Club.
					
					 The hearse left for the Patriotic Martyrs Cemetery in Sinmi-ri.
					
					 A ceremony of bidding farewell to the deceased took place.
					
					 Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the SPA Presidium, said in a eulogy that the death of Ryu Mi Yong, a renowned woman political activist, was a great loss.
					
					 Though her heart stopped beating, the feats she performed for the country and nation will remain forever, Yang stressed.
					
					 The remains of the deceased were buried in the grave of Choe Tok Sin, her husband, and bereaved family members and members of the funeral committee spread earth on the grave.
					
					 Placed before the grave was a wreath bearing the august name of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also laid were wreaths in the names of the C.C., WPK, the SPA Presidium, the C.C., Chondoist Chongu Party and others.
					
					 All the participants observed a moment's silence in memory of the deceased.

articles.title: Japan-S. Korea Agreement on Protecting Military Intelligence Termed Hostile to DPRK
articles.content:
Japan-S. Korea Agreement on Protecting Military Intelligence Termed Hostile to DPRK
 Pyongyang, November 25 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK released a statement on Friday sniping at the agreement on protecting military intelligence concluded between Japan and south Korea despite the unanimous opposition and denunciation of Koreans and other people in the world.
					 Terming the agreement hastily concluded by Japan and the south Korean puppet forces at the prodding of the U.S. under the absurd pretext of coping with "nuclear and missile threat" from the DPRK an intolerable act hostile to the DPRK, the statement said:
					
					 Acute military confrontation and tensions linger on the Korean peninsula due to the hideous moves of the U.S., Japan and other hostile forces against the DPRK.
					
					 Against this backdrop, Japan and the south Korean puppet forces concluded an agreement on military cooperation. This will only result in escalating the danger of war on the Korean peninsula as it is an act of the lackeys of the U.S. to do harm to the DPRK, pursuant to the U.S. hostile policy and nuclear threat and blackmail against the DPRK.
					
					 The conclusion of the agreement is a blatant challenge to the Korean people and the international community aspiring after peace and stability on the Korean peninsula and in the region.
					
					 The situation clearly proves that the U.S. and its vassal forces are chiefly to blame for harassing peace and stability and ratcheting up confrontation and tensions.
					
					 Through the conclusion of the agreement Japan seeks to pave the way for emerging a military giant and realizing the wild ambition for launching reinvasion and the south Korean puppet regime works hard to tide over the worst-ever ruling crisis.
					
					 However, it will only precipitate their self-destruction.

articles.title: Foreign Ministry Researcher on Poor Human Rights Performance in U.S.
articles.content:
Foreign Ministry Researcher on Poor Human Rights Performance in U.S.
 Pyongyang, November 25 (KCNA) -- Pak Song Il, a researcher at the Institute for American Studies of the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK, issued the following commentary titled "Poor Human Rights Performance in the U.S." on Friday:
					 "Hatred-driven crimes" are unabated in the U.S. amid increasing racial and religious contradictions.
					
					 According to results published by the FBI and several other law enforcement and investigation organs in the U.S., the number of radical racial and religious organizations like Ku Klux Klan and the "Islamic State Movement" has doubled while bloody crimes among them sharply jumped.  Similar crimes targeting the black, Muslims and minorities have increased more than 67 percent, in particular.
					
					 Last week alone, a black man opened fire at a policeman for no reason in San Antonio in Texas before taking to flight and ambush attacks against four policemen took place one after another in three states of the U.S., killing one and wounding three.
					
					 Media comment this as retaliation against white policemen in Louisiana, Minnesota and Texas who "hunted" innocent black men after branding them as "criminals".
					
					 The evil cycle of "hatred-driven crimes", murder, and retaliatory murder that stem from extreme racism and religious contradictions is an incurable malignant tumor grown by the reactionary social system in the U.S.
					
					 People suffer from uneasiness and horror of being killed any moment, far from being protected, for the mere reason that they have colored skin and differing religious faith. This is a true picture of the American society.
					
					 The U.S., kingpin of human rights abuses, has to worry about its own deplorable human rights situation, far from finding fault with the "human rights performance" in other countries.

articles.title: Disarmament and Peace Institute Researcher Derides Park Geun Hye as Rabid Dog
articles.content:
Disarmament and Peace Institute Researcher Derides Park Geun Hye as Rabid Dog
 Pyongyang, November 25 (KCNA) -- Cha Yong Mi, researcher of the Disarmament and Peace Institute of the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK on Friday issued a commentary titled "Those who shield moribund rabid dog are bound to be beaten".
					 Park Geun Hye who monopolized "state affairs" as "dictated" by shaman made the south Koreans feel ashamed of their own "country" and now declared a "war" against them, shocking the world.
					
					 Park who promised to do her best for the settlement of the scandal case and to respond to investigation in teary voice at the "meeting for making apology to the people" denied everything she said while yet words are still from her mouth. This has touched off public criticism that Park denied resignation and investigation but declared a "war against the people".
					
					 Muddy spring will have muddy streams. Just as this saying goes, the traitor Park fully revealed her ignorance and self-complacency even abroad.
					
					 Park is stepping up the deployment of THAAD of the U.S. despite unanimous opposition at home and abroad in a bid to find a way-out by currying favor with her master. In the meantime, she concluded the agreement on protecting military intelligence with Japan, endangering the regional peace and security.
					
					 It is as clear as noonday that she can not evade miserable end no matter how persistently she goes as she is already lost to elementary sense of discerning where she stands, far from facing up to the trend of the times.
					
					 Lots of countries which had dealings with the traitor who is no more than the puppet of the shaman, being unaware of her true nature, are hardly repressing disillusion with her.
					
					 Those who shield moribund rabid dog are bound to be beaten and those who deal with the Park group are bound to face shame and disgrace.

articles.title: Delegation of Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist Youth League Back Home
articles.content:
Delegation of Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist Youth League Back Home
 Pyongyang, November 25 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist Youth League headed by Secretary of its Central Committee Jong Yong Won returned home on Friday after taking part in the second international preparatory meeting of the 19th World Festival of Youth and Students and the meeting of the General Council of the World Federation of Democratic Youth held in Namibia.

articles.title: Officials of Missions of Int'l Bodies Here Visit Flood-hit Northern Part of DPRK
articles.content:
Officials of Missions of Int'l Bodies Here Visit Flood-hit Northern Part of DPRK
Pyongyang, November 25 (KCNA) -- The UN resident coordinator and concurrently UNDP resident representative and staff members of the missions of the UNICEF, the United Nations Population Fund, the WFP, the WHO, the European Union Programme Support and the Office of the Agency for Development and Cooperation of the Swiss Foreign Ministry in the DPRK visited the afflicted areas in the northern part of North Hamgyong Province from November 19 to 21.
					 They went round newly built dwelling houses, schools, kindergartens, nurseries, hospitals and clinics in Hoeryong City, Musan and Yonsa Counties and learned about the use and distribution of aid materials offered by international bodies and organizations to different fields.
					
					 They were admired to see the miracle wrought in the drive for turning adversity into favorable conditions thanks to the might of the great army-people unity.
					
					 Satisfied to confirm the proper distribution of aid materials and their effective use, they expressed their will to continue to render selfless help to the Korean people in their efforts to completely eradicate the aftermath of the disaster.

articles.title: Officials and Members of Women's Union Meet
articles.content:
Officials and Members of Women's Union Meet
 Pyongyang, November 25 (KCNA) -- Officials and members of the women's union met at the Hall of Women on Friday to vow to implement the tasks set forth in supreme leader Kim Jong Un's letter to the participants of the 6th Congress of the Democratic Women's Union of Korea (DWUK).
					 At the meeting Kim Jong Sun, chairwoman of the Central Committee of the women's union delivered a report which was followed by speeches.
					
					 The reporter and speakers noted that Kim Jong Un made sure that the 6th DWUK Congress was opened and sent the letter "Let Us Further Intensify the Work of the Women's Union under the Banner of Modeling the Whole Society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism" to its participants and gave the women's union the highest honor of renaming it the Socialist Women's Union of Korea.
					
					 They stressed that the letter serves as an immortal great programme to be always held fast in eternally glorifying the women's union as that of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and of the Party under the banner of modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and further developing its work as required by the new era of Juche revolution.
					
					 They called for making a positive contribution to the prosperity of the country by thoroughly implementing the tasks set forth in the letter of Kim Jong Un and the decision made at the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: Food Exhibitions Held
articles.content:
Food Exhibitions Held
 Pyongyang, November 25 (KCNA) -- The 6th National Exhibition of Liquor and Essential Foodstuff, the National Exhibition of Children's Foodstuff and the 6th Exhibition of Food Products of Provincial General Foodstuff Factories took place at the exhibition hall of mass consumption goods of the Ministry of Food and Consumer Goods Industries of the DPRK Nov. 22-25.
					 Presented to the exhibition were thousands of varieties of children's foodstuff, liquor, soy sauce, bean paste and cooking oil produced by factories and enterprises across the country.
					
					 Various parched-rice powder, milk powder, dozens of confectionary and other new products from the Pyongyang Children's Foodstuff Factory, the Pyongyang Cornstarch Factory, the Sonhung Foodstuff Factory and the Kyonghung Unhasu Foodstuff Factory were highly appreciated. 
					
					 The participants praised essential foodstuff produced by the Pyongyang, Kaesong and Sinuiju essential foodstuff factories, the Usi Soybean and Sauce Factory, the Maengsan Foodstuff Factory and other units for their good taste and standardization.
					
					 Drawing attention of the participants were liquors and makkoli (crude liquor) presented by the Taedonggang Foodstuff Factory, the Pyongyang Liquor Factory, the Kanggye Winery, the Taedonggang Combined Fruit Processing Factory and the Sariwon Kyongam Liquor Factory.
					
					 The Songdowon, Paeksonog, Jongbangsan, Amnokgang and Suyangsan general foodstuff factories took the first place at the exhibition of products of provincial general foodstuff factories. 
					
					 During the exhibitions, there were visits to the model factories of the food industry including the Pyongyang Children's Foodstuff Factory and a workshop of science and technology.

articles.title: Wangjaesan Art Troupe Performs in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Wangjaesan Art Troupe Performs in Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, November 25 (KCNA) -- Artistes of the Wangjaesan Art Troupe gave premiere at the East Pyongyang Grand Theater on Friday.
					  The performance began with music "We Will Go to Mt. Paektu". Put on the stage were colorful numbers reflecting the dynamic advance of the country.
					
					  In female chorus "Our Comrade Kim Jong Un", female duet "His Humanity", the performers truthfully represented the boundless reverence for supreme leader Kim Jong Un who covers the road of patriotism for the happiness of the people whom President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il loved so much and records the epic of loving the people.
					
					 Female solo and pangchang "It Is Offensive", light music "Higher and Faster," etc. encouraged the audience in their drive to perform the heroic feats at worksites in the spirit of self-development and the spirit of devotedly carrying out the Party's policies.
					
					 Tap dance "Youth Days" and "Cheerful Soldier on the Cook's Duty" and national dance "Drum Dance" and other numbers delighted the audience.
					
					 The performance ended with epilogue "We'll Travel One Road Forever".
					
					 It was enjoyed by Pyongyangites.
					
					 The performance will go on.

articles.title: DPRK Team Advances into Semifinals of 2016 FIFA U-20 Women's World Cup
articles.content:
DPRK Team Advances into Semifinals of 2016 FIFA U-20 Women's World Cup
 Pyongyang, November 25 (KCNA) -- The DPRK team advanced into the semifinals of the 2016 FIFA U-20 Women's World Cup.
					 It trounced its Spanish rival 3:2 in the quarterfinals on Thursday.
					
					 It will play semifinals on Nov. 29.

articles.title: DPRK Proves Successful at 49th World Military Shooting Championship
articles.content:
DPRK Proves Successful at 49th World Military Shooting Championship
 Pyongyang, November 25 (KCNA) -- Pak Yong Hui, Kim Yong Bok and Yang Sol I of the DPRK took the first place in the women's team skeet shooting of the 49th World Military Shooting Championship, setting new record.
					 Meanwhile, Kim Hyon Ung bagged a bronze medal in the men's individual 25m centre fire pistol.
					
					 The championship, held in Qatar on Nov. 14-19, brought together more than 450 men and women players from 50 countries and regions, including the DPRK, Russia, China, Germany and Norway.
					
					 The DPRK players returned home on Thursday.

articles.title: Local Network Service for Schools Starts in Disaster Areas
articles.content:
Local Network Service for Schools Starts in Disaster Areas
 Pyongyang, November 25 (KCNA) -- Local network service for 32 schools and branches was begun in flood-hit areas of North Hamgyong Province, the DPRK.
					 According to an official concerned, supreme leader Kim Jong Un took measures for rendering network service to schools in disaster areas on a high level early in November.
					
					 True to the Workers' Party of Korea's conception of loving the younger generation, the Ministry of Posts and Telecommunications finished preparations for network service until Nov. 15.
					
					 With the start of network service in the flood-hit areas, schools and branches could get access to databases of the Sci-Tech Complex and other scientific and educational institutions to raise the standard of education.

articles.title: Results of Public Building Construction in Flood-hit Areas
articles.content:
Results of Public Building Construction in Flood-hit Areas
 Pyongyang, November 25 (KCNA) -- The construction of schools, clinics and other public buildings is progressing apace at the final stage in Musan County, one of the flood-hit areas in North Hamgyong Province of the DPRK.
					 The Ryomyong Street Construction Shock Brigade completed Yukdong Branch of Haksan Senior Secondary School, other schools and clinics ahead of schedule.
					
					 Meanwhile, the Construction Shock Brigade 922 finished the building of Chonjae and Kwangdok senior secondary schools and nurseries and kindergartens in Minbong-ri.

articles.title: U.S. Should Make Deliberate Strategic Option: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
U.S. Should Make Deliberate Strategic Option: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, November 25 (KCNA) -- Assertions that the DPRK's access to nuclear weapons and the increase of their quality are a hard reality and the next U.S. administration should prudently shape its Korean policy in recognition of the reality are being heard from U.S. media and experts on the Korean affairs.
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday says in a commentary that such assertions are results made in the light of the DPRK's strategic position and the balance of power between the DPRK and the U.S. which underwent a fundamental change.
					
					 The commentary stresses that the DPRK has a thing to clearly tell the U.S. once again, adding:
					
					 The DPRK's nuclear deterrence is not a bargaining chip for holding political negotiations or for economic dealings but the life of the nation which can never be bartered for anything and a national treasure of reunified Korea.
					
					 Any attempt to force the DPRK to abandon nuclear weapons is no more than a pipedream.
					
					 The DPRK has produced various type smaller, lighter and diversified nuclear weapons and fully manufactured means of delivery of nuclear weapons which can hit any place of the world
					
					 The U.S. should clearly understand this fact. As long as the U.S. nuclear threats against the DPRK continue, the latter will never abandon its nuclear deterrence.
					
					 The U.S. politicians should draw a lesson from their predecessors' wrong DPRK policy. The U.S. military pressure against the DPRK will never work.
					
					 As long as the U.S. nuclear threats and arbitrary practices continue, the will of all service personnel and civilians of the DPRK to bolster up its defense capabilities with the nuclear deterrence as a pivot will remain unchanged.
					
					 The U.S. policymakers should bear this in mind and deliberately make a correct strategic option. Doing so is the only way for the U.S. to defuse its crisis and retrieve its disgraceful image even a bit.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye's Bid to Tide over Crisis Is Not Tolerable: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye's Bid to Tide over Crisis Is Not Tolerable: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, November 25 (KCNA) -- Traitor Park Geun Hye's bid to tide over crisis by running the whole gamut of gimmick will spark off stronger rebuff of the south Korean people and they will remove all the hordes of traitors, Rodong Sinmun Friday says in an article.
					 The article goes on:
					
					 Now the Park Geun Hye group is trying to while away the time and prolong the present situation in reliance on some confidants in Chongwadae, pro-Park circle of the "Saenuri Party", puppet Intelligence Service, prosecution and military and tide over the crisis and serve out a full term.
					
					 In fact, Park advertised that she would respond to the prosecution's investigation, but she denied it one day before facing investigation under absurd pretexts.
					
					 What was more shameless for Park was that she issued an order to carry out "a strict investigation" into the LCT scandal in Pusan regarding it as a good opportunity.
					
					 Days ago, Park arbitrarily appointed the second vice minister of Culture, Sports and Tourism, deriding the people's strong demand for her resignation.
					
					 These days she has gone impudent as to talk about "summit talks" with the U.S. president-elect.
					
					 This goes to prove that traitor Park is making desperate efforts to stay in power at any cost despite strong demand of the working masses in south Korea, always regarding them as fools.
					
					 However her cunning trick to tide over the crisis is not workable. The angry south Korean people will never tolerate it.

articles.title: Issue of Sexual Slavery Can Never Be Glossed over: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Issue of Sexual Slavery Can Never Be Glossed over: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, November 25 (KCNA) -- Victims of sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army in various countries gathered in Tokyo recently and sent a letter criticizing the Japanese government to Prime Minister Abe.
					 Victims from south Korea, Indonesia, East Timor and Philippines bitterly lamented over the pain they suffered due to sexual slavery and demanded the Japanese government make an apology and reparation for the crime.
					
					 The event-sponsoring side claimed Japan-south Korea "agreement" cannot help settle the issue of sexual slavery, urging the Japanese government to take a step acceptable to all victims.
					
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Friday says:
					
					 The issue of sexual slavery is not merely an issue that can be glossed over with a petty amount of money but a sensitive political and international matter.
					
					 There are victims of sexual slavery not only in south Korea but in the north of the Korean peninsula, other countries in Asia and Europe.
					
					 They haven't yet received an official apology from the Japanese government, and Japan has disregarded all of them.
					
					 The world history of war knows no such country as Japan which regarded women of other countries as means for raising the morale of aggressor troops and reduced them to sexual slaves.
					
					 Japan should make an apology for the crime, bearing responsibility.
					
					 With no sleight of hand can Japan cover up the thrice-cursed sexual slavery.
					
					 Japan persists in behaving sordidly in defiance of the truth of history but the service personnel and people of the DPRK will surely force it to pay dearly for all crimes it committed during its colonial rule over Korea.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Forces Stage Provocative Burlesque
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Forces Stage Provocative Burlesque
 Pyongyang, November 25 (KCNA) -- A series of provocative farces were staged one after another in different parts of south Korea on Nov. 23, six years since the Yonphyong Island shelling incident occurred, according to the south Korean Yonhap News.
					 The south Korean warmongers held a memorial ceremony at the "joint tomb of the war dead in Yonphyong Island shelling" in Taejon, beautified their provocative course while talking about "noble sacrifice" and "people's courtesy" and made rubbish of labeling defeat as "victory".
					
					 Units of the puppet forces situated in the hot spot waters in the West Sea staged firing drills of self-propelled artillery pieces and missiles, survival drill of soldiers and evacuation drill of inhabitants to cope with "provocation from the north", fanning up a war fever.
					
					 Earlier, puppet Minister of Defense Han Min Gu went to Yonphyong Island on Nov. 22, where he asserted that "northwestern islands are where the south and the north stand in acute confrontation", "the north's provocation like the one six years ago should never be allowed" and "stern punishment should be meted out to defend the northwestern islands".
					
					 The puppet marine corps reportedly set the month November as a "period of remembering the Yonphyong Island shelling" and will conduct "special mental education for officers" and joint drills of units at different levels.

articles.title: Kwangju Citizens of S. Korea Launch Candlelight Rally
articles.content:
Kwangju Citizens of S. Korea Launch Candlelight Rally
 Pyongyang, November 25 (KCNA) -- There took place a candlelight rally of workers and other citizens in Kwangju of south Korea on Nov. 23 to force Park Geun Hye to step down, according to the south Korean online newspaper Voice of People.
					 The co-executive chairman of the Headquarters of the Kwangju Citizens Movement for Ousting Pak Geun Hye branded Park as the chief culprit of all recent scandals.
					
					 He called for forcing Park to step down by the efforts of the people.

articles.title: Struggle Launched in S. Korea to Urge Park Geun Hye's Resignation
articles.content:
Struggle Launched in S. Korea to Urge Park Geun Hye's Resignation
 Pyongyang, November 25 (KCNA) -- The Council for Proper Settlement of the Past, grouping civic and public organizations in south Korea, called a press conference in Seoul on Nov. 23 to denounce the "Park Geun Hye and Choe Sun Sil scandal" and demand Park Geun Hye's resignation.
					 The organization said in a press release that those forces who monopolized the "state affairs" should be punished and hit the prosecution for reducing the case to the scandal of some individuals.
					
					 It noted that the first investigation results on the "Park Geun Hye and Choe Sun Sil scandal", published by the prosecution, confirmed the truth that Park Geun Hye demanded the fund-raising for establishing the Mir and K Sports foundations and was chiefly responsible for the leakage of various kinds of secrets.
					
					 On the same day, political parties and civic organizations staged an action demanding Park Geun Hye's resignation and thorough-going investigation into the scandal.
					
					 The Taejon Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration held a press conference before the Girl Statue for Peace in Taejon to urge the nullification of a military intelligence sharing agreement with Japan as well as the resignation of Park Geun Hye.
					
					 The opposition Minju Party formed the Jeju Island and South Kyongsang Provincial branch of the headquarters of people's sovereignty movement, urging the Park Geun Hye's regime to step down.

articles.title: S. Korean Social Bodies Demand Thorough Investigation of Business Tycoons' Involvement in Scandal
articles.content:
S. Korean Social Bodies Demand Thorough Investigation into Business Tycoons' Involvement in Scandal
 Pyongyang, November 25 (KCNA) -- The south Korean online paper Voice of People said on Nov. 23 that civic and social bodies including the Citizens Solidarity for Democratic Society and the Confederation of Trade Unions demanded that the business tycoons involved in the "Park Geun Hye-Choe Sun Sil Scandal" be investigated.
					 There took place in front of the puppet Seoul Central District Prosecutor's Office a news conference where the bodies exposed the investigation into the scandal by the prosecution as the one for shielding the tycoons.
					
					 The bodies urged the prosecution to conduct a full investigation into the scandal the essence of which is politics-business nexus.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Tanzania
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Tanzania
 Pyongyang, November 25 (KCNA) -- A Tanzanian committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il was inaugurated on Nov. 19.
					 Francis F. Lyimo, chairman of the Tanzanian National Coordinating Committee of the Juche Idea Study Groups, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee decided to significantly organize political and cultural events praising Kim Jong Il's revolutionary life and exploits in the period from Nov. 19 to Dec. 17.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Finland
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Finland
 Pyongyang, November 25 (KCNA) -- A committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the 5th anniversary of his demise was formed in Finland on Nov. 20.
					 Kalevi Wahrman, chairman of the Finnish Communists' League, and Pekka Kotkasaari, chairman of the Finland-Korea Society, were elected chairmen of the committee.
					
					 The committee decided to significantly organize political and cultural events praising Kim Jong Il's revolutionary career and feats.

articles.title: Int'l Body Lauds Leader Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Int'l Body Lauds Leader Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, November 25 (KCNA) -- The Korean Friendship Association posted on its website an article titled "Trace Left in Panmunjom," illustrated with a photo of the monument inscribed with President Kim Il Sung's last signature on a document of national reunification, on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's inspection of Panmunjom.
					 The article said that Kim Jong Il called for handing the reunified country down to the coming generation when inspecting Panmunjom with an iron will to defend the security of the country and the destiny of the nation.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 His inspection of Panmunjom inspired all the Korean people with confidence in national reunification and meant a deadly strike at the enemies.
					
					 Chairman Kim Jong Un identical to General Kim Jong Il inspected it in March 2012.
					
					 He is keeping to the road of Songun revolutionary leadership to achieve the reunification of the country and safeguard the destiny of the nation.
					
					 Thanks to him the Korean people are sure to build a reunified and rich powerful socialist country.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Letter Introduced by ACP
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Letter Introduced by ACP
 Pyongyang, November 25 (KCNA) -- The gist of "On the Basic Tasks Facing Kim Il Sung University in the New Era of the Juche Revolution", a letter sent by supreme leader Kim Jong Un to the teaching staff and students of Kim Il Sung University on its 70th founding anniversary, was posted on a website by the ACP (news agency of DR Congo) on Nov. 19.
					 The work, published on Sept. 27, Juche 105 (2016), says that the history of the university, the centre for training native cadres and the highest seat of the Juche-oriented science education, is that of brilliant victories of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il's Juche-based educational idea and theory and their distinguished leadership.
					
					 It also clarifies the tasks and ways for the university to fulfill the mission and duty it has assumed for the times and the revolution.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un inspecciona comandancia de la gran unidad combinada 380 del EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un inspecciona comandancia de la gran unidad combinada 380 del EPC
Pyongyang, 25 de noviembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, inspecciono la comandancia de la gran unidad combinada 380 del EPC.
					Ante todo, el paso revista al monumento a la visita de orientacion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, la sala de educacion en la historia revolucionaria y la otra de presentacion del historial. 
					
					Viendo atentamente los datos exhibidos, dijo que gracias a la sabia orientacion y minuciosa atencion del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, esta unidad ha crecido como destacamento de flor y nata preparado tanto para el ataque como para la defensa de la guerra moderna.
					
					Evaluo de altos los meritos de los oficiales y soldados de la unidad diciendo que anteriormente, ella realizo proezas orgullosas en la defensa de la patria y la construccion del socialismo, y en particular, hizo aporte a manifestar plenamente el espiritu y temperamento de lucha y la combatividad del EPC cuando fue enviada con urgencia a la campana de resarcimiento de danos en las zonas septentrionales del pais.
					
					Alabando el hecho de que la unidad realiza con escrupulosidad la educacion mediante la sala de educacion en la historia revolucionaria y la otra de presentacion del historial bien acondicionadas, destaco la necesidad de dinamizar las labores educativas para hacer a los uniformados asimilar con el corazon las imborrables hazanas de orientacion de los grandes Lideres y la orgullosa historia y tradicion de su destacamento.
					
					En su recorrido por la sala de militares, instruyo seguir realizando ingentes esfuerzos por intensificar la educacion de 5 tipos, presentada por el partido, para formar a los uniformados como indoblegables combatientes que no renuncien el credo en la revolucion aunque se mueran en el camino de defensa de la patria socialista. 
					
					Reviso los documentos de combate tras escuchar en la sala de estudio de asuntos militares el informe del comandante de la unidad sobre el plan operacional de defensa. 
					
					Pasando revista a la sala de leccion sobre la operacion y otros puntos, se cercioro del estado de cumplimiento de mision y de entrenamiento y de la rutinaria disposicion de combate de los destacamentos adscritos a la gran unidad combinada.
					
					Elogio a los comandantes y funcionarios del Estado Mayor que perfeccionan los ingeniosos y diestros planes operacionales y tacticos con que se pueda llevar a cabo por el estilo coreano todas las operaciones y batallas. 
					
					Se mostro muy contento de que los militares se prepararan como combatientes versados en varios reglamentos de accion en el combate y capaces de aniquilar a solas a cien enemigos y se impulsaran perfectos preparativos de entrenamiento con el entusiasmo por registrar innovaciones colectivas en los ejercicios combativo-politicos para el nuevo ano.
					
					Recalcando que es muy importante la mision que asume la unidad, presento las tareas que serviran de guia en completar los preparativos de combate de ella e intensificar por todos los medios su combatividad.
					
					Dijo que no se preocupa de la zona de defensa encargada por la unidad.
					
					Se fotografio con los oficiales y soldados de ella expresando la esperanza y conviccion de que estos defenderan firmemente con los fusiles la patria socialista.
					
					Le acompanaron en esta ocasion Hwang Pyong So, Choe Ryong Hae y Ri Yong Gil.

articles.title: Efectuada ceremonia funeral de Ryu Mi Yong
articles.content:
Efectuada ceremonia funeral de Ryu Mi Yong
Pyongyang, 25 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 25 en esta capital como homenaje publico la ceremonia funeral de la difunta Ryu Mi Yong, miembro del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, diputada a la APS y presidenta del Comite Central del Partido Chondoista Chong-U.
					En la ocasion participaron Yang Hyong Sop, Kim Yong Chol, el presidente del Comite Central del Partido Social-Democrata de Corea, Kim Yong Dae, y otros miembros del comite funeral, los funcionarios del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, el Presidium de la APS, el CC del Partido Chondoista Chong-U, el CC del Partido Social-Democrata de Corea, el Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria, el Secretariado del CC del Frente Democratico para la Reunificacion de la Patria, el CC de la Federacion de Budistas de Corea, el CC de la Federacion de Cristianos de Corea y el CC de la Asociacion de Catolicos de Corea, y los familiares de la difunta. 
					
					Antes de la salida del feretro para el entierro, los dolientes y los miembros del comite funeral guardaron un momento de silencio en memoria de la fallecida.
					
					El carro funebre partio hacia el Cementerio de Martires Patrioticos en la Comuna de Sinmi.
					
					Alli se realizo la ceremonia de despedida.
					
					Al pronunciar la palabra de duelo, Yang Hyong Sop, vicepresidente del Presidium de la APS de la RPDC, dijo que es una gran perdida el deceso de Ryu Mi Yong, celebre activista politica. 
					
					Enfatizo que aunque fallecio Ryu, quedaran para siempre sus meritos realizados ante el partido y la nacion. 
					
					Sus restos mortales fueron enterrados junto con los de su esposo Choe Tok Sin por sus familiares y los miembros del comite funeral.
					
					Al pie de la tumba fue depositada una ofrenda floral en nombre del Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					
					Tambien fueron colocadas las otras a nombre del CC del PTC, el Presidium de la APS de la RPDC, el CC del Partido Chondoista Chong-U, etc.
					
					Los participantes guardaron un momento de silencio en memoria de la difunta.

articles.title: MINREX condena firma de "acuerdo de proteccion de informaciones militares"
articles.content:
MINREX condena firma de "acuerdo de proteccion de informaciones militares"
Pyongyang, 25 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Con respecto a que Japon y los titeres surcoreanos firmaron el acuerdo de proteccion de informaciones militares pese al unanime rechazo y condena de los nacionales y extranjeros, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hizo publica el dia 25 una declaracion que sigue:
					Japon y los titeres surcoreanos, instigados por EE.UU., suscribieron el acuerdo de proteccion de informaciones militares bajo el pretexto de hacer frente a la "amenaza nuclear y de misil" de la RPDC, lo cual es una intolerable accion hostil a la RPDC.
					
					Ahora se mantiene el estado de aguda confrontacion militar y tension en la Peninsula Coreana, debido a las brutales maniobras anti-RPDC de EE.UU., Japon y otras fuerzas hostiles. 
					
					En tales circunstancias, la fabricacion del "acuerdo" de cooperacion militar Japon-Sur de Corea, encaminada a perjudicar a la RPDC en adhesion a la politica hostil y la amenaza y chantaje nucleares anti-RPDC de EE.UU., no traera otro resultado que aumentar el peligro de guerra en la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					Tal proceder de Japon y los titeres surcoreanos resulta un desafio frontal a la aspiracion del pueblo coreano y la sociedad internacional a la paz y estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana y el resto de la region.
					
					La realidad demuestra evidentemente que EE.UU. y sus seguidores, que se enfrascan en las acciones hostiles a la RPDC, son los autores que perturban la paz y la estabilidad y agravan el enfrentamiento y la tension. 
					
					Con la firma del presente acuerdo anti-RPDC, Japon pretende abrir la via de convertirse en potencia militar y realizar su ambicion de nueva agresion mientras los titeres surcoreanos quieren eludir la peor crisis de dominacion. 
					
					Pero, esos intentos aceleraran mas la autodestruccion de ellos.

articles.title: Director del MINREX se reune con el embajador sueco en Corea
articles.content:
Director del MINREX se reune con el embajador sueco en Corea
Pyongyang, 25 de noviembre (ACNC) -- El titular de la Direccion 2 de Europa del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la RPDC se reunio ayer con el embajador de Suecia en Corea y discutio el problema de relaciones bilaterales y el de contacto consular para Rim Hyon Su, ciudadano canadiense que cumple actualmente la pena de trabajo reformatorio indefinido recibida por sus actos criminales anti-RPDC.
					Con respecto a que aprovechando esta oportunidad, el embajador planteo la visita de funcionario consular a los criminales norteamericanos retenidos en la RPDC, el director dio destaque a la posicion de principios del gobierno de la RPDC de que se tratan segun la ley del tiempo de guerra todos los problemas surgidos en las relaciones con EE.UU. frente a los extremados actos hostiles de la administracion Obama que se atrevio a desafiar a la dignidad suprema de la RPDC.

articles.title: Presidium de la APS ratifica la "Convencion de Derechos de los Discapacitados
articles.content:
Presidium de la APS ratifica la "Convencion de Derechos de los Discapacitados"
Pyongyang, 25 de noviembre (ACNC) -- El Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea ratifico el dia 23 la "Convencion de Derechos de los Discapacitados". 
					La RPDC suscribio la convencion el 3 de julio de 2013 y tomo parte activa en las actividades relacionadas con la misma en calidad de observadora durante 3 anos pasados. 
					
					A base del documento, el gobierno de la RPDC asegurara mas los derechos y el confort de los discapacitados y fortalecera la cooperacion internacional.
